actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for improved public recreation access to Pathfinder Reservoir, North Platte Project, Wyoming.

summary.text: Authorizes construction of an all-weather road by the Secretary of the Interior to provide for improved public recreation access to Pathfinder Reservoir, North Plattle project, Wyoming. Authorizes appropriations of $3,000,000 for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide for improved public recreation access to Pathfinder Reservoir, North Platte Project, Wyoming.
